body.name: STANLEY Adventure Big Grip Beer Stein | 24 OZ
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 5 hrs 14 mins
FREE pickup Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 5 hrs 14 mins
features: KEEP IT NICE & COLD: From the first gulp to the last sip, the Stanley insulated beer stein keeps your brew refreshingly chilled. The secret behind the thirst-quenching thermal insulation? Vacuum insulated double walls that keep drinks hot for up to 1 hour, cold for up to 5 hours, and chilled for a whopping 20 hours. And with a large capacity of 24oz, you’ll have the power to empty 2 cans at a time and cut down trips to the beer cooler or fridge in the kitchen.

MEET THE RUGGED LEGEND: It’s the insulated beer stein that’s made its way into outdoor folklore. The beer stein cup that’s crossed paths with speeding bullets, category 5 hurricanes, and 4000ft drops and lived to drop jaws another day. It’s the Stanley Adventure Beer Stein! Made of 18/8 stainless steel and crafted to last a lifetime, this is more than just a mug – it’s a rugged heirloom. Whatever you throw at it, this legend will handle it.

SIP IN COMFORT: Whether you’re hanging out at that backyard BBQ, sipping on some ale out in the wild, or cooling down with a lager in the pool, this insulated metal beer stein makes every sip an adventure in comfort. You’ll love the feel of the extra-large handle; a big grip that gives you a firm grasp through the most raucous of toasts. And thanks to the double-walled insulation, the exterior of this insulated drinking mug stays sweat-free as you enjoy a cold one.

A GIFT TO REMEMBER: The Stanley Big Grip beer mug is what every gift dreams of being when they grow up: practical, durable, and a recipe for countless compliments. Christmas, birthday, or anything in between, this insulated stein is just what you need to crown the occasion. That beer lover won’t just be blown away by the temperature retention, they’ll relish the ease of cleaning. This bad boy is dishwasher safe and can be quickly rinsed courtesy of the smooth interior.

BUILT FOR LIFE: Since 1913 we’ve promised to provide rugged, capable gear for food and drink - accessories built to last a lifetime. It’s a promise we still keep. Stanley products purchased from Stanley Resellers come with a lifetime warranty. So, whether it’s an epic hiking adventure out in the wild, a fishing trip with hopes of reeling in a prized Muskie, or the day-to-day grind navigating the urban jungle, you can rest easy knowing we’ve got your back through it all
body.description: And you should be able to always have a cold brew as it keeps bevies cold for up 7 hours and iced for 30. The stein is also dishwasher safe and has a lifetime. With that news you are free to cheers, drink and repeat. Up your tailgate and beer festival game with the Stanley Adventure Vacuum Stein boasting a burley look to go with your individual drinking style.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Beer Stein, Keeps It Nice and Cold!
reviews.reviewText: Great beer stein, I like this a lot. The color pop is really cool and unique, definitely won't be lost in a group setting, haha. The handle is nice and comfortable, easy to grip and hold, and though the mug itself is nice and solid and durable feeling, it isn't overly heavy feeling either. Keeps the beer nice and cold for long times even with the open face, which is impressive, and can hold a good amount. The steel ring on your lips can take a little getting used to, but it's not really a negative, just not what I'm used to. All in all, would definitely recommend, new favorite for certain!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, good material and great for outdoors
reviews.reviewText: Loved this. Got it for my husband mainly for camping for his brews and it's absolutely perfect. The green color is perfect, it's sturdy and the beer stays cold

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality for a cold beer!
reviews.reviewText: Excellent quality stein. Honestly I did not expect it to be as good as it was. I ended up testing it by pouring a cold beer into it and letting it sit for over an hour. By hour 5, I almost forgot I poured my beer, went to drink it, and it was still just as cold as when I poured it. Even if it was a little flat, as to be expected after 5 hours. but still nice and cold. Recommend it for both regular drinkers and sippers alike. Stanley quality as expected.Also, the handle was more comfortable than expected, for hard plastic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tervis Straw Lid
reviews.reviewText: When you go to an all-inclusive resort, one suggestion you'll hear over and over is to bring your own tumbler like a Tervis, Bubba, or Yeti. For me, this Stanley Stein may be the perfect mug for all-inclusive travel. Overall, it's a fantastic mug and I highly recommend it.1- Construction: This feels sturdy with a powder-coated exterior, stainless steel interior, and sturdy handle that feels good to hold. Many alternative mugs have a flimsy handle or don't have a handle at all (Tervis).2- Lids: As mentioned in other reviews, the lids for 16oz Tervis Tumblers fit perfectly. I used a non-matching Tervis Travel Lid that I had hanging around and liked it so much that I upgraded to a matching black one. I also purchased a matching Tervis Straw Lid. I have not seen any reviews that mention the straw lid specifically, so I thought it was worth mentioning that it also fits like it was made for it (pictures attached). It would be nice if this came with its own lid, but the Tervis lids are a great alternative and do the job of keeping sand and other debris out of your drink.3- Capacity: For me, 24oz is the right capacity to bring to an all-inclusive resort. It's large enough to fit a generous portion and you don't need to get out of your lounger or the pool too often. But it's not so large to feel embarrassed carrying it around, or that people scoff at it (I'm looking at you 52oz Bubba Keg).4- Shape: I like that it is wider at the bottom than at the top which makes tipping it over just that much harder. Many travel mugs are designed to fit into a cup holder which means they're skinny at the bottom and are more likely to tip over when not in a cup holder. This stein won't fit in a normal cup holder, but that's not what it's made for. If you are looking for something to keep on your desk, this shape is more spill-proof than something that's skinny at the bottom. The interior is wide enough to clean by hand more easily than many other options too.5- Price: This is more affordable than many other options. If you don't care about the color and/or cosmetic damage check the "New & Used" items and you may be able to save nearly 14 dollars (which you can use on a matching Tervis lid). I own a hammertone green Stanley travel coffee mug that I love the classic style of. I sometimes wish I had gotten this in the hammertone green color as well, but wasn't willing to spend the extra money on it at the time I purchased the black one on sale.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very nice mug. The wider base makes it very stable unlike the taller travel mugs. NIce substantial handle for a comfortable grip. Packaging/shipping could have been better as this arrived in a brown envelope with no padding or bubble wrap - fortunately I was outside and was handed it directly by the driver - it would have likely dented if it was dropped on my doorstep.Keeps iced drinks cold for hours. Generous 24 oz capacity is just right.The Tervis Travel Lid for 16 oz tumblers fits perfectly. It also prevents contact with the cold or hot metal lip of the mug while drinking, if that bothers you. The plastic feels better for me.Not so much for the fit of the XccMe 30oz Skinny Tumbler Replacement Lids that another reviewer recommended - those are a smidge too small and are thus not secure and allow leakage past the rubber gasket while drinking with the lid on - but I guess it is good enough to help keep drinks colder or warmer for longer periods than without a lid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Ourdoor Beer Lover
reviews.reviewText: Stanley is always such an amazing product! But this beer cup is amazing. My favorite time to use it when we are out by the lake and camping. It’s not heavy or bulk like most Stanley product. The beer stays cold for hours. I sometimes forget about it as I am chasing the kids, but it’s always cold when i come back to it!
Muito bom, minha mãe utiliza principalmente para deixar água com gelo, já que cerveja não fica tanto tempo no copo

reviews.reviewTitle: Gran opción, para cerveceros de verdad!
reviews.reviewText: Excelente tarro!Mantiene fría la cerveza por mucho tiempo..
Lo super recomiendo para echar cheve, en lugar de un tarro de vidrio que suda/moja, mil veces mejor este porque no suda y mantiene la bebida super fría! (No trae tapa, no es termo).
This mug is big! Stays fairly cold as well. Haven’t tried anything hot in it.
Es un tarro excelente, le caben dos latas de 355ml y se mantiene fría por horas a pesar de no tener tapa.
